explains: vt. 维护；证明……无辜；证明……正确

sentences.en: The 2010 harvest did not seem to vindicate his judgment.
sentences.cn: 但2010年的收成却似乎不能佐证其判断。

sentences.en: Save me, o God, by your name; vindicate me by your might.
sentences.cn: 用丝弦的乐器。神阿，求你以你的名救我，凭你的大能为我伸冤。

sentences.en: This does not vindicate the American invasion, which unleashed chaos and strife.
sentences.cn: 虽然选举并不能证明激起混乱和冲突的美国入侵行动是正确之举。
